data.title: Triathlon Association of Hong Kong China
meta_keywords: Triathlon Association of Hong Kong China
data.meta_description: Triathlon Association of Hong Kong China
data.text:
The Hong Kong Triathlon National Squad Potential comprises of selected talented athletes from both the Junior and Open classification. In order to be included, interested athletes need to take part in the National Squad Potential Selection Time Trial. Those who pass the National Squad Potential Qualifying Times will then be considered for possible inclusion into the National Squad Potential according to the Selection Policy. The Hong Kong Sports Institute may also consider offering a scholarship to National Squad Potential athletes upon recommendation.

The National Squad Potential Qualifying Times are specially set for talented athletes of different age group ranges. Selected athletes are to comply to certain obligation and may be entitled to some benefits, bound by certain policies. The following are our National Squad Potential Athletes:

Name Affiliated Club Ting Chun Ching Male Youth 13 and below Sparkle Triathlon Chau Cheuk Yin Desmond Male Youth 13 and below Energetic Triathlon Shatin Chung Chi Yan lan Male Youth 13 and below Tam Tze Kiu Male Youth 13 and below Energetic Triathlon Shatin Ng Cheuk Kiu Male Youth 13 and below Energetic Triathlon Shatin Au Ho Chun Male Youth 15 Energetic Triathlon Shatin Cheng Tsz Leong Louie Male Youth 15 Cheung Wai Ching Jesse Male Youth 15 Kwok Ching Ho Male Youth 15 Crest Ray Recreation & Sports Club Shum Yan Tao Male Youth 16 Chan Ka Hei Cyrus Male Youth 16 Chow Yu Chak Male Elite Junior 17 Crest Ray Recreation & Sports Club Yick Po Shun Yemi Male Elite Junior 17
